definition: to be called/to be known as
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Behold, this is the realm I call my own.
sentences.chinese: 看啊，這便是我喚作只屬於“我”的領域。

sentences.english: What about stepping on a cockroach?
Freud called lovesickness “the psychosis of  normal people.”3
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德把相思病喚作“正常人的精神病。”

sentences.english: Freud called lovesickness “the psychosis of normal people.”3
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德把相思病喚作“正常人的精神病。”

sentences.english: Maybe, there was a kind of reason is called the heart not to move.
sentences.chinese: 或許，世上有一種緣被喚作此心不移。
